name.ja: <ruby>堕<rt>だ</rt></ruby><ruby>天<rt>てん</rt></ruby><ruby>使<rt>し</rt></ruby>ジェフティ

text.en: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Darklord" monster from your Deck in Defense Position, except "Darklord Djehuty", also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except Fairy monsters. If you control a DARK Fairy Fusion Monster: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Darklord" card or "Forbidden" Quick-Play Spell in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Darklord Djehuty" once per turn.
